org.cleverbus.core.common.asynch.msg
Interface MessageOperationService

All Known Implementing Classes:
MessageOperationServiceImpl
public interface MessageOperationService

Defines contract for manipulation with existing messages.

Author:
Viliam Elischer

Method Summary
 void cancelMessage(long messageId)
          Cancels next message processing, sets MsgStateEnum.CANCEL state.
 void restartMessage(long messageId, boolean totalRestart)
          Method designed to change the state of an asynchronous message (moved from MsgStateEnum.FAILED to MsgStateEnum.PARTLY_FAILED.
 

Method Detail

restartMessage

void restartMessage(long messageId,
                    boolean totalRestart)
Method designed to change the state of an asynchronous message (moved from MsgStateEnum.FAILED to MsgStateEnum.PARTLY_FAILED.

Parameters:
messageId - Identifier of the message used in the restart process (must be in FAILED state)
totalRestart - true if message should start from scratch again or false if message should continue when it failed

cancelMessage

void cancelMessage(long messageId)
Cancels next message processing, sets MsgStateEnum.CANCEL state. Only MsgStateEnum.NEW, MsgStateEnum.PARTLY_FAILED and MsgStateEnum.POSTPONED messages can be canceled.

Parameters:
messageId - the message ID
